OrderHeader.description: An Order may be either a SalesOrder or a InternalReturn Order.

MetaInsertDate.description: Database created timestamp of insert of row.

MetaFilterDate.description: Database created timestamp of latest update of row.

Event.description: Event being captured, which might be prefixed with 'augmented.'. Event is either in ['DataChange', 'Resend'] or it applies to all elements where Event = ProjStatus and ProjStatusCode<>ProjStatusCodeOld (e.g. when EVENT='Dispatch').

MsgSource.description: Event source, e.g. ITM, Centiro, ISOM etc, or SOIA.

OrderType.description: OrderType may be one of : 0001 == SalesOrder, 0003 == InternalReturnOrder, 0005 == PurchaseOrder.

OrderSubType.description: Order subtype, e.g. ShowRoomOrder. For the ShowRoom order the OrderSubType will be 'ShowRoom [Store=STO.<BuCode>] [ZipStore=STO.<BuCode>]' essentially saying there will be the tag 'ShowRoom' and the optional tags Store, ZipStore.

OrderNo.description: Unique identifier of the Sales/InternalReturn Order.

SrcOhKey.description: Technical key of OrderHeader in source system (usually ISOM).

EntryType.description: Order entry type. Can be 'INTERNET', 'STORE' or something else.

DeliveredDate.description: Date when the Order was delivered to the customer.

GaSell.description: Geographic sell area. 'CTY' followed by ISO-2 of the country/region of the enterprise that is selling, e.g. 'SE'.

VatValue.description: Sum of Vat Charges for all Order Lines in this Order.

DeliveryValue.description: Sum of Delivery Value for all Order Lines in this Order.

ServiceType.description: May be e.g. HOME_DELIVERY, CLICK_COLLECT, PUOP and PUP.

PaymentMethod.description: How the order was/is going to be paid for, e.g. PAYMENT_ON_DELIVERY, CASH etc.

PaymentStatus.description: If the order has been paid for, e.g. PAID, PARTIALLY PAID, UNPAID etc.

ProjStatusCodeOld.description: Previous projected (SOIA calculated) status code, i.e. the ProjStatusCode from the previous message.

ProjStatus.description: Projected (CompSO calculated) status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

StatusCodeOld.description: Assumed ISOM status code of previous message.

Status.description: Assumed ISOM status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

WorkOrder.description: The Sales Order is built by 1 or more WorkOrders, generally speaking being handled as one deliverable unit.

MetaInsertDate.description: Database created timestamp of insert of row.

MetaFilterDate.description: Database created timestamp of latest update of row.

WorkOrderNo.description: Identifier of the WorkOrder (delivery). Will form a PK if combined with ORDER_NO. Will only be available in iSell for SalesOrders.

SrcWoKey.description: Technical key of WorkOrder in source system (usually ISOM).

PromisedDelivStart.description: Promised start point in time for the delivery.

PromisedDelivEnd.description: Promised end point in time for the delivery.

DeliveredDate.description: Date of actual delivery to the customer.

VatValue.description: Sum of VatValue for all Order Lines in this Work Order.

DeliveryValue.description: Sum of DeliveryValue for all Order Lines in this Work Order.

UnitMerge.description: Merge node (LSC or STO) for the goods being sent to the customer. Only for Sales Orders.

WoType.description: Work Order (Delivery) type. DS for Delivery Services, PS for Provided Services.

ProjStatusCodeOld.description: Previous projected (SOIA calculated) status code, i.e. the ProjStatusCode from the previous message.

ProjStatus.description: Projected (CompSO calculated) status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

StatusCodeOld.description: Assumed ISOM status code of previous message.

Status.description: Assumed ISOM status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

OrderLine.description: An Order is built by 1 or more OrderLines having a specific ItemNo and a Quantity.

MetaInsertDate.description: Database created timestamp of insert of row.

MetaFilterDate.description: Database created timestamp of latest update of row.

CompLineNo.description: CompSO (Computed) order line number. Will form a PK if combined with OrderNo.

OrderLineNo.description: Orderline number (from iSell for SalesOrder). May be used together with OrderNo to retreive info from iSell/ISOM.

SrcOlKey.description: Technical key of OrderLine in source system (usually ISOM).

XrefSrcOlKey.description: Technical cross reference key of OrderLine in source system (usually ISOM).

XrefSrcOhKey.description: Technical cross reference key of OrderHead in source system (usually ISOM).

XrefOrderNo.description: Points back to the original SalesOrder if this is an InternalReturn Order, or to the InternalReturn Order if this is the cancelled SalesOrder.

XrefCompLineNo.description: The CompSO (Computed) order line number accompanying XrefOrderNo..

XrefOrderLineNo.description: The (iSell) Order Line number accompanying XrefOrderNo.

LineType.description: OrderLine type. PROD for product lines. DS for Delivery Services, PS for Provided Services.

DeliveredDate.description: Date when the Order Line was delivered to the customer.

InternalReturnDate.description: Date, when there was an InternalReturn created for (part of) this Order Line.

DdcFlag.description: Default 0, ==1 if DDC flow, ==2 if decentr, ==9 if unknown.

DeliveryType.description: IKEA ItemId for delivery type; e.g. SGR50000597 (Parcel), SGR40000606 (Truck).

ServiceProviderId.description: Centiro ID (GUID) of the Service Provider, if LineType is PS. IKEA CAR id from Centiro, prefixed with 'Centiro.' if LineType is DS.

VatValue.description: Vat Charges. Only for lines where LineType is 'DS'.

DeliveryValue.description: Delivery Value. This is the FreightValue if LineType is 'DS'. If LineType is 'PROD' it is RetailPrice*ItemQtyAct.

UnitFictional.description: Fictional sending Unit (derived from  GA_SELL). Only for SalesOrders. May or may not be the actual CDC.

UnitShip.description: Shipping unit for this this OrderLine. May be CDC, SUP or STO if a SalesOrder. This will be the Receiver (STO or CDC) if a ReturnOrder.

XrefUnitShip.description: Cross reference value for UNIT_SHIP. For an Internal Return Order this will be UNIT_SHIP for the SalesOrder and vice versa.

ItemId.description: An item in IKEA is always formed by the ITEM_TYPE (3 characters) followed by the ITEM_NO (8..15 digits). CompSO is concatenating this.

ItemQtyUom.description: Unit of Measure. PIECE, METER, ORDERS etc.

ItemQtyOrig.description: The quantity which was ordered at order creation. This is not modified after order confirmation.

ItemQtyAct.description: Active (Delivered, if that status is reached) quantity for the orderline (this includes deduction of posible cancellations etc).

ItemQtyResvStock.description: Quantity iSOM has reserved towards stock at hand.

ItemQtyResvGit.description: Quantity iSOM has reserved towards Goods-in-Transit.

ItemQtyDamaged.description: If a (precise) damaged quantity could be discerned (mostly for Internal Return orders).

ItemQtyMissing.description: If a (precise) missing quantity could be discerned (mostly for Internal Return orders).

BackorderedDate.description: Date, when the quantity was backordered (the first time).

AllocatedDate.description: Date, when the quantity was allocated (the first time).

ReleasedDate.description: Date, when the quantity was released for fulfilment (the first time).

PickedDate.description: Date, when the quantity was picked (the first time).

ShipDate.description: Date, when the OrderLine is expected to be shipped,

SywVersion.description: Number of weeks this OrderLine sales quantity has been updated.

SywLatest.description: Sales Year Week of the latest update of the OrderLine quantity (ItemQtyAct).  Note that a SYW starts on a Sunday.

SywLatestQty.description: Quantity (ItemQtyAct) from the latest Sales Year Week update of the Order Line.

SywLatestQtyDelta.description: Delta quantity (latest:ItemQtyAct - previous:ItemQtyAct) compared to the previous Sales Year Week.

SywPrevious.description: Sales Year Week of the previous update of the OrderLine (Note that a SYW starts on a Sunday).

SywPreviousQty.description: Quantity (ItemQtyAct) of the previous Sales Year Week.

SywPreviousQtyDelta.description: Delta quantity (prev:ItemQtyAct - old:ItemQtyAct) compared to the  Sales Year Week before the previous SYW.

ProjStatusCodeOld.description: Previous projected (SOIA calculated) status code, i.e. the ProjStatusCode from the previous message.

ProjStatus.description: Projected (CompSO calculated) status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

StatusCodeOld.description: Assumed ISOM status code of previous message.

Status.description: Assumed ISOM status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

OrderLineDetail.description: When an OrderLine is transported, there is 1 or more OrderLineDetails.

MetaInsertDate.description: Database created timestamp of insert of row.

MetaFilterDate.description: Database created timestamp of latest update of row.

DetailLineNo.description: ID for the Order Line detail. Unique within the Order Line (always starting with 1..). PK if combined with OrderNo and CompLineNo.

DetailType.description: Type of OrderLineDetail. May be 'Unknown', 'Consignment', 'CDU' or 'Combined' if there is both Consignment and CDU information.

CduCsmState.description: State of how the CduId is matched with CsmId. U=Unknown, H=Heuristic or D=Determined, C=CDU only

CsmlId.description: The (unique) Consignment Line Identifier (BU_TYPE_CRE.BU_CODE_CRE.CSM_NO.CSML_NO) generated in warehouse or supplier system.

UnitCnor.description: Consignor (Unit creating the Consignment information), from BU_TYPE_CNOR and BU_CODE_CNOR (see CSML_ID).

UnitDsp.description: Dispatching unit (from where the goods is actually shipped).

UnitCnee.description: Consignee. Where the goods is received (InternalReturn Order) or merged to form the delivery to the customer.

UnitSup.description: Supplier, the actual originator, of the goods. Not available when store fulfillment. Not guaranteed for InternalReturn Orders.

XrefCsmlId.description: The Consignment Line ID (ref CsmlId) cross reference to the original Consignment line (only for InternalReturn Orders).

XrefCduId.description: The CDU ID cross reference to the original CDU (only for InternalReturn Orders).

ItemQty.description: The quantity for this particular OrderLineDetail. The sum of OrderLineDetails ItemQty should match the ItemQtyAct on OrderLine level

LoadedAtCuDate.description: Date, when the quantity was loaded at Central Unit.

DispatchedDate.description: Date, when the quantity actually has been dispatched. Might be derived. This timestamp may change if the first value was derived.

DispatchedDate1.description: Date, when the quantity actually has been dispatched (the first found time stamp).

ReceivedAtHubDate.description: Date, when the quantity was received at hub. Might be derived. This timestamp may change over time.

ReceivedAtHubDate1.description: Date, when the quantity was received at hub the first time.

LoadedOnTruckDate.description: Date, when the quantity was loaded at truck. Might be derived. This timestamp may change over time.

LoadedOnTruckDate1.description: Date, when the quantity was loaded at truck the first time.

AvailableForPupDate.description: Date, when the quantity was avalilable for Pick Up. Might be derived.

AvailableForPupDate1.description: Date, when the quantity was avalaible for Pick Up the first time.

DeliveredDate.description: Date, when the quantity was delivered.

MissingDate.description: Date, when the quantity was found to be missing.

DamagedDate.description: Date, when the quantity was found to be damaged

DeliveryFailureDate.description: Date of the latest delivery failure.

DeliveryRefusedDate.description: Date of the latest delivery refusal.

InternalReturnDate.description: Date, when the quantity was deemed for an internal return.

ProjStatusCodeOld.description: Previous projected (SOIA calculated) status code, i.e. the ProjStatusCode from the previous message.

ProjStatus.description: Projected (CompSO calculated) status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

StatusCodeOld.description: Assumed ISOM status code of previous message.

Status.description: Assumed ISOM status, e.g. Dispatched, Delivered etc.

title: CompositeSalesOrder
description: This is the JSON schema for the CompSO (Composite SalesOrder) produced by SOIA.
